    Specifies a callback to run if the form validation succeeds.
    Form
    Form.setErrorTemplate(String template)
    Changes how errors are displayed in getAllErrors(), by allowing a custom template string with {field} and {message} placeholders.
    Form

    Sets (or updates) the value for the specified field in this form.

  • Uses of Form in ca.jolt.routing.context

    Methods in ca.jolt.routing.context that return Form
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Form
    JoltContext.buildForm(String... excludes)
    Builds a new Form by aggregating data from all available sources: Query parameters (or form-encoded parameters) JSON request body (if the Content-Type is "application/json") Path parameters extracted from the URL In case of duplicate keys, the values from later sources override those from earlier sources.
